page.title: 05RECREATION GOLF
page.content: {CHAMPIONSHIP COURSE:}The Royal Dornoch Golf Course is rated 10th best in the world. Membership is open to anybody who wishes to join. The cost of the membership is very reasonable. {FEATURES:}The course was founded in 1877. It lies northeast of Dornoch on the coast. The main features of the course are strong winds, gorse and high greens. There are two pros and a modern Clubhouse. The Struie course has nine holes but will shortly be enlarged to an eighteen hole course.{ {TOURNAMENTS:}In the summer of 1985 the British Amateur Open came to Dornoch. In 1984 the Scottish Ladies' Open came to Dornoch.There is a golf competition for Primary pupils and another for Secondary pupils. There are many other local competitions for both local players and visitors. The main local tournament is the Carnegie Sheild.
